meanings.definition: The front part of a building
meanings.sent1: The facia of the house had a beautiful design.
meanings.sent2: The architect included a unique facia in the building's design.
meanings.sent3: The facia of the building seemed to smile at passersby.
meanings.sent4: The facia of the building stood proudly like a crown.
meanings.sent5: The colorful facia made the building easy to spot from afar.

meanings.definition: A covering or finishing for the front of a structure
meanings.sent1: The facia protected the front of the house from the rain.
meanings.sent2: The wooden facia added a touch of elegance to the structure.
meanings.sent3: The facia decided to dress up as a superhero for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: The facia was like a shield, guarding the building from harm.
meanings.sent5: The shiny facia gleamed in the sunlight, enhancing the structure's appearance.

meanings.definition: A flat horizontal member that forms the top of a cornice
meanings.sent1: The facia on the cornice provided a smooth finish.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter carefully installed the facia on the cornice.
meanings.sent3: The facia on the cornice decided to take a nap in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The facia on the cornice was like the cherry on top of a cake.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the facia on the cornice added a touch of sophistication.
